body:
When I run `spack test packaging` on macOS 10.14.6 with Python 3.7.3, I see the following error:
```
gpg: keybox '/private/var/folders/21/hwq39zyj4g36x6zjfyl5l8080000gn/T/pytest-of-Adam/pytest-5/test_buildcache0/gpg/pubring.kbx' created
gpg: can't connect to the agent: File name too long
gpg: agent_genkey failed: No agent running
gpg: key generation failed: No agent running
```
I filed a bug [here](https://github.com/pytest-dev/pytest/issues/5802) and it looks like there are ways to manually configure the `tmpdir` directory.

@alalazo
title: pytest tmpdir too long for gpg tests on macOS
